steps.name: When  User sends request with inputs {batchName,batchDescription, batchStatus, batchNoOfClasses, ProgramId where BatchName created dynamically by following pattern "Jan23-CRUDCarriers-SDET-001"
Then  User should able to create new Batch with system generated BatchId
And  User receive 201 OK Created status code User should receive valid JSON response with Batchid,BatchName,BatchDescription, BatchStatus, batchNoOfClasses,programId,programName
